attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Obviously talking and helping hasn't helped. Children, adults, grandparents are dying because a government are so blinded by their own greed, that they can not see what is underneath their own noses.  We need to remove the egotistical people from power to help the many from a fate of death.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
